input_text: source target factuality: The late Bin Baz was the grand Muslim scholar in Saudi Arabia.

target_text: Immediately after the interview, he was [apprehended|true] again by the Jordanian authority.

input_text: source target factuality: Sheik Rida, fear God.
target_text: Sheik Rida, [fear|true] God.

input_text: source target factuality: You are not fair when you belittle Sheik Bin Baz's blunder and exaggerate the one by Sheik Maqdasi...

input_text: source target factuality: Sheik Maqdasi did not criticize Sheik Bin Baz's only for his edict which emphasizes not to consider a regime an apostate if it hasn't adhered to Islamic laws.
target_text: Sheik Maqdasi did not [criticize|true] Sheik Bin Baz's only for his [edict|true] which [emphasizes|true] not to [consider|true] a regime an apostate if it hasn't [adhered|true] to Islamic laws.

input_text: source target factuality: Well, this is not the case.
target_text: Well, this [is|true] not the case.

input_text: source target factuality: If, you study the evidences and statements released by these people, we tend to appreciate their ignorance which was based on prominent views.
target_text: If, you [study|true] the [evidences|true] and [statements|true] released by these people, we [tend|true] to [appreciate|false] their ignorance which was [based|true] on prominent [views|true].

input_text: source target factuality: We had done that before with others who were known for their serious blunders.
target_text: We had [done|true] that before with others who were [known|true] for their serious [blunders|true].

input_text: source target factuality: I'm not going to illustrate these evidences and statements; God is my witness, I don't want to deceive anyone.
target_text: I'm not going to [illustrate|true] these evidences and statements; God [is|unknown] my witness, I don't [want|true] to [deceive|unknown] anyone.

input_text: source target factuality: However, I will mention one of these evidences reiterated by them.
target_text: However, I will [mention|true] one of these evidences [reiterated|true] by them.

input_text: source target factuality: Indeed, the Sheik issued two edicts regarding the same issue that contradict each other...
target_text: Indeed, the Sheik [issued|true] two [edicts|true] regarding the same [issue|true] that [contradict|true] each other...

input_text: source target factuality: First, he forbade seeking the aid of infidels when the Syrian Mujahiddin asked Saddam Hussein to overthrow the regime of Hafiz Al-Assad in Syria.

input_text: source target factuality: [He issued] more edicts to accommodate the policies of the Saudi regime.

input_text: source target factuality: This behavior and not the edict itself forced them to be deceptive.
target_text: This [behavior|true] and not the [edict|true] itself [forced|true] them to [be|true] deceptive.

input_text: source target factuality: I am sure that you are aware of all these suspicions that surround the regime's [Religious] scholars.
target_text: I [am|true] sure that you [are|true] aware of all these [suspicions|true] that [surround|true] the regime's [Religious] scholars.

target_text: So, [try|true] to [appreciate|unknown] the Muslims' [position|true], especially if these suspicions [are|true] credible.

input_text: source target factuality: Brother Rida, I plead to you through this article to understand the views of others, just like we try to understand the views of those who went astray.
target_text: Brother Rida, I [plead|true] to you through this article to [understand|true] the [views|true] of others, just like we [try|true] to [understand|unknown] the [views|true] of those who [went|true] astray.
